reviews.review: its half life 2. what else is there to say?
it's HL2. need more be said now?
A+ Rated Game from those from Velociti Entertainment.
one of the best storyline games i've ever played

Если честно даже в наш 2020 год таких прекрасных и душевных проектов очень мало 
есть всего несколько игр которые настолько прекрасны как эта игра
its the best game you should defintley get it
Literally cannot find a negative review, and I agree with all of them.
If you haven't played HL2, you haven't reached full human potential. I'd say this is the greatest game ever made.
An absolutely fantastic game, so well deserving of all praise. HL3, Valve. Make it happen.
As many years past still be the number one
ITS JUST GREAT PLAY WEN YOU CAN!!!!!
когда я захожу в эту игру у меня встает хуй на 5 часов понели да?
This is a masterpiece! The gameplay is innovative and the storytelling is brilliant!
AMAZING GAME! ANYONE WHO LIKES ANY SORT OF COMBAT GAMES I HIGHLY RECOMEND THIS GAME THERE IS NO WAY TO NOT LIKE THIS GAME!!!

Half-Life oyunlarının benim için yeri farklıdır. Küçüklüğümden beri oynarım. Bu zamana kadar bütün serisini 20 den fazla bitirmiş bulunuyorum. Çıkış yılına göre grafikleri de çok iyi herkese tavsiye ederim.
Hızlı başlıyor,vuruş hissi güzel,grafikler hala çok güzel , bölüm tasarımları güzel oynayın işte Half life 2 sonuçta
Başları çok güzel , ortaları birazcık sıkıcı , sonları efsane ötesi muhteşem 10/9
I am a bit late to this game but yeah its just as good as Half-life 1 in terms of  atmosphere, several times the game has made me jump :P you have action and jumping puzzles.
刚玩的时候晕的不行，玩了两天以后挺过来了，目前免疫一切3d游戏，感谢hl2治好了我多年的3d眩晕症
крутая игра графика тоже нечего мне понравилось
Один пользователь посчитал этот обзор полезным

Oh Gaben, forgive me for taking the swashbuckling route in my teens in order to play through this game.

I will now give you $3.00 for all the effort and decades you put into this.
经典老游戏，起源引擎不错，左轮伤害是真滴高

起源引擎的优越效果和表现力放到今天也是非常强大。无论是场景交互，还是人物对话，都有非常强的沉浸感。尤其是游戏中的细节和背景音乐的穿插不得不说G胖的刷子可能不止两把。
弗里曼先生，该醒了。
愿胜利的曙光与您常在，能和您并肩作战，我感到非常荣幸。
Советую купить каждому кто хть что-нибудь понимает в игровой индустрии. Если единственная игра в которую вы играете это Майнкрафт и Террария, то тут уж как хотите.
It has a good story line u shoud try it out i guess

este juego es la cuarta entrega de half life (digo cuarta por que esta opposing force y blue shift ) esta muy bueno ya que se reconozen las caras de los conocido como por ejemplo: barney y dr. kleiner esta muy bueno el juego contando con episode ONE y episode TWO
i mean, it's halflife, what couldn't you like? hahahauhahhah but seriously everything is perfect about this game
game is old but its still holds up as one of the best games out there
不会真的有人感觉不好玩8？
This game holds up really well even in 2020. In my opinion, the graphics still look good and the game offers quite a bit of a challenge. If you haven't played yet I highly recommend it.

Très bon jeu bien qu'il soit bien à faire qu'une fois et que c'est un jeu pour BOOMER.
Faites le !

A definitive improvement over the last game as well as a pillar of modern fps games.
Too bad Valve left the franchise in the dust, for it could have become something even greater.
you can shoot the crows and they go "CAW* then fall then die
可能是游戏玩的不多的原因。半条命给我的感觉就是关卡设计毫不过时，不过剧情方面在已经见识过各种影视的剧情后，倒是比较，呃，就是感觉还行吧。
this is an amazingly beutiful game with an amazing story and very exsprssent NPCs

Simply the Best Game!
and I'm writing this in 2020...

добро пожаловать. Добро пожаловать в Half0life 2. Сами вы его выбрали, или его выбрали за Вас. Это лучшая игра от Valve из оставшихся. Я такого высокого мнения о Half-life 2, что решил разместить его на своём ПК, столь заботливо представленного моими родителями. Оставайтесь. Здесь интереснее.

Tuhle hru když jsem poprve hral,ani jsem ji nedohral,nuda,je vni tolik špatnych veci.Podlouhe době jsem se rozhodl ji dohrat,ale o nic jsem nepřišel,jezdeni na vodě a močale,je opravdu nuda.Složite ukoly a hlavně otravne.Tu hru dělal debil.Radší si zahrají,motorove čluny,než tak dlouho jezdit na vodě,ve vrtulniku terminator,vždycky vas najde.A ten konec vubec neměly dělat,promě ta hra skončila dřiv.

Crap game cause G-Man didn't have sexy time with me and I didn't see Miss Pauling. TF2 is much better then this freaking garbage of a game, you must have severe brain damage to play this game. Krombz is a fat piggy.
Я играл в пиратку но стим версия не запускаеться мне очень понравилось надеюсь и всем понравиться
Oyun grafikleri çok iyi ben grafikleri ortada kullanıyorum oyunun hikayesi güzel ve zor komik şeyler olabiliyor!
dunno. just buy it and go fuck yourself
半条命1的续作 2代的故事情节也非常棒 我们的弗里曼又来拯救人类了~~~~~ 啥都别说跟着弗里曼！！！！！！打爆联合军的狗头~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Muy buen juego en el nivel facil la dificultad es asequible,muy buena la historia,graficos impresionantes para la epoca que no han envejecido actualmente,la saga me esta encantando,me remito a la anterior reseña del Half Life source en la que entiendo el exito de dicho juego,si bien es cierto que las pantallas de carga tardan un poco mas de lo normal y que hay un arma que esta chetada,ya solo queda completar la saga con el episodio 1 y 2.
